title: Hingerand [2004] - estonian folk-christian songs
description:
i would label it as modern estonian folk-christian music by singer-songwriters  based on the texts of Estonian poets from past. i am sharing it cause i have been spelled by the simplicity and deepness of these melodies and lyrics, for many years now already ...


there are only three songs, that i can share... because i do not have the original CD any longer.. and these 3 songs are the only ones that i made a copy to myself ... i bought it (CD) from one of the concerts that they (j. vaino and t. tulp) gave and i liked it, really... i listened it, i learned the lyrics, i chanted the songs ... and shared it with many good people, i know.. and one of them have, who has my CD, has not returned (but i hope to get it back).
   

lyrics are in estonian. but if you like, leave a commentary and i can translate the texts..

with love,
(where ever you are)


-
